sentence.Network_en: Two other bombs failed to detonate.
An engineer tried to detonate the mine.
sentence.Network_cn: 一名工程师试图引爆地雷.

sentence.Network_en: France is expected to detonate its first nuclear device in the next few days.
sentence.Network_cn: 法国预计将在几天后引爆其首枚核装置。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 爆炸用英语怎么说_百度知道 ... 爆炸的声音震得他耳根发麻。 The noise of the explosion detonate 引爆 explode 使爆炸.
"detonating... ... detonating 雷管帽; 爆炸的; 起爆; detonating cap 雷管; 起爆帽; 决定系统; 起爆帽(玩具).
Detinue 请求返还扣留物之诉detonate 爆燃爆炸detonate 爆炸

list.abs: detonating fuse 爆破线detonation indicator 点火指示器-
deterrence of diversion 转用制止detonating gas 爆鸣气detonation 爆炸
detonating agent 发爆剂detonating cap 起爆帽detonating explosive 起爆炸药
石油英语词汇(S8)--石油百科 ... symon fault 隆起 sympathetic detonation 殉爆 symphrattism 动力变质作用.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from Latin detonat- 'thundered down or forth', from the verb detonare, from de- 'down' + tonare 'to thunder'

entry.def: If someone detonates a device such as a bomb, or if it detonates, it explodes.

example.ex: France is expected to detonate its first nuclear device in the next few days...
example.tran: 法国预计将在几天后引爆其首枚核装置。

example.ex: An explosive device detonated on the roof of the building.
example.tran: 一个爆炸装置在该楼的楼顶爆炸了。

auth_sentence.content: It failed to detonate and he was subdued by passengers.
auth_sentence.res_content: It failed to detonate and he was subdued by passengers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It failed to detonate and he was subdued by passengers.

auth_sentence.content: Remote-controlled land rovers can detonate bombs or buried land mines.
auth_sentence.res_content: Remote-controlled land rovers can detonate bombs or buried land mines.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Remote-controlled land rovers can detonate bombs or buried land mines.

auth_sentence.content: Passengers subdued the Nigerian after his explosives failed to detonate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Passengers subdued the Nigerian after his explosives failed to detonate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Passengers subdued the Nigerian after his explosives failed to detonate.
